name: BINX' BAKERY 1.0.4
description:
Hello!

now you may be wondering what exactly you're looking at, well binx' bakery is a 2D point and click story economy/cooking game where you can earn money buy upgrades and even decorate your own house you bought with your hard-earned money!

binx' bakery was made by a single developer in a few weeks but keep in mind it's NOT done yet! this playable teaser is only the bare bones to something HUGE if you want to join us in this journey through puzzles and uncover the truth about binx' bakery and the strange staff that work there download our game and maybe even leave a donation to help support us!

we are a small team and will take any help we can get so thank you for reading and have a baketastic day!

follow our discord for updates: https://discord.gg/yTdY39YT
